I am am pretty sure I am nvidia-docker2, which I use daily, and it still has the alias so you do not have to do --runtime=nvidia that is only needed if you want to trigger is without the alias. But their docuemtnation says to use what @chrish42 states.

Change the install to indicate nvidia-docker2 and go ahead and change the command to docker run --runtime=nvidia since that is how nvidia documents it. Both may work but no reason to deviate from their instructions.
